synopsis.text: Yoshida Chizuru, a college student with an alluring charm, has a clandestine life as a successful model and TV commercial star, defying the strict no-work policy for students. When her secret is discovered by a rookie professor, he attempts to exploit this information for his own gain. However, Chizuru is determined to protect her acting career at any cost, even if it means visiting his apartment for the night. Amidst this, a new student's innocent charm captures everyone's attention, including Chizuru's. Will Chizuru's professor maintain his integrity, or will her captivating appeal prove irresistible? And how will Chizuru handle the growing affection for the new student? Only time will tell in this enticing anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
